title: JsonRpcSigner

iconType: solid
---

> **注意**: このページはまだ日本語に翻訳されていません。以下は英語の原文です。

A signer that uses JSON-RPC to sign transactions and messages.

## Extends

- [`AbstractSigner`](/jp/sdk/content/classes/AbstractSigner)\<[`JsonRpcApiProvider`](/jp/sdk/content/classes/JsonRpcApiProvider)\>

## Constructors

### new JsonRpcSigner()

```ts
new JsonRpcSigner(provider, address): JsonRpcSigner
```

Creates a new JsonRpcSigner instance.

#### Parameters

| Parameter | Type | Description |
| :------ | :------ | :------ |
| `provider` | [`JsonRpcApiProvider`](/jp/sdk/content/classes/JsonRpcApiProvider)\<`any`\> | The JSON-RPC provider. |
| `address` | `string` | The address of the signer. |

#### Returns

[`JsonRpcSigner`](/jp/sdk/content/classes/JsonRpcSigner)

#### Overrides

[`AbstractSigner`](/jp/sdk/content/classes/AbstractSigner).[`constructor`](/jp/sdk/content/classes/AbstractSigner#constructors)

### connect()

```ts

```

### signTypedData()

```ts

   domain, 
   types, 
_value): Promise<string>
```

| :------ | :------ | :------ |
| `domain` | [`TypedDataDomain`](/jp/sdk/content/interfaces/TypedDataDomain) | The domain of the typed data. |
| `types` | `Record`\<`string`, [`TypedDataField`](/jp/sdk/content/interfaces/TypedDataField)[]\> | The types of the typed data. |
| `_value` | `Record`\<`string`, `any`\> | The value of the typed data. |
